title: How to Keep Your Headphones From Tangling

steps.title: After every use of headphones, start by placing them in your right or left hand.
steps.content: After every use of headphones, start by placing them in your right or left hand.

steps.title: Wrap the cord around the four fingers that you gripped the earbuds with.
steps.content: Wrap the cord around the four fingers that you gripped the earbuds with. Leaving about two inches unwrapped.

steps.title: Try keep the cord in the same shape as it was on your hand.
steps.content: Try keep the cord in the same shape as it was on your hand. This will make the next steps easier.

steps.title: Now the cord will look like a figure eight.
steps.content: Now the cord will look like a figure eight.

steps.title: Look the cord around the figure snugly, but not too tight.
steps.content: Look the cord around the figure snugly, but not too tight.

steps.title: Easy, right?
steps.content: Easy, right? Now your headphones are secure enough to put in your bag without getting tangled.
